"Damn that was a boring party." Alex thought, walking down the street. It was late friday night, and he had gone to a teammates house to celebrate a win over their rivals, but the party sucked so Alex left. He decided to cut through the woods and through a field which would take him to the back side of his neighborhood. Finally he reached to field, and looked up in the midnight sky as he walked. Soon something caught his eye.

"What is that?" Soon the bright light in the sky turned into a fireball and a meteor slammed into the ground next to Alex, who could only watch with wide eyes. He walked over to the small pit in the ground formed by the rock, and found a red and black ooze coming from a crack in the middle. He reached out to touch it, when he blacked out.

...

"What in the...?" Alex said, as he woke up. His head pulsed, and he grabbed it as a migraine set in. Soon his vision cleared and he looked around. The meteor was gone, as well as any trace of it ever being there, and as he began to think that it was all a dream, something went off in his head.

"Do not be alarmed, Alex." he heard himself think. After realizing what happened the voice in his head explained. "I am with you now. I need nitrogen to survive, and unfortunated this planet only has nitrogen in a gaseous form, so I had to take a host. I am you now Alex. And you are me." Alex paused, actually not too afraid of what was going on (probably the alien's doing).

"How did you do that? How are you inside me?" He asked... himself.

"I am what you would call a virus, only slightly different. I have entered your body, and conformed to your personality and lifestyle. The only outwards evidence of my existence is the manifestation of my abilities within a human body, or you for instance." The boy tried to take it in, and was lost at what abilities the virus inside him spoke of.

"What kind of abilities?" He asked.

"Watch." A second later, Alex was seeing the world from all around, and realized he was now the goo he saw coming out of the meteor.

"Woah!" he said. He willed himself to change back, and was back to normal.

"Yes, and that is but one of your new powers. Now, I must rest. Enjoy your new powers, but please don't get us killed." He felt something inside him turn off, and he looked around, finally taking it all in. How freaking cool was this...

"I wonder what else I can do?" Suddenly a wave wint down his arm and his arm turned into a blade, like something from a video game. "Sweet! That's so cool! He swung his arm around, feeling like a badass whem something broke that illusion.

"Hey kid, what are you doing? Put that weapon down!" He turned and saw a cop standing there, her hand on her gun. What does he do?

info.brief_description: An unknowing teenager stumbles upon an alien symbiote. Gift points for good chapters!
info.description:
Alex is a highschool student on his way home from a party one night. A meteor crashes next to him, and as he investigates a symbiote merges with him giving him a whole array of powers (think prototype). Shit gets pretty crazy from there.

Alex Porter- 16, junior in highschool. Short blonde hair, and an athletic build. Plays lacrosse for his school Wyncroft high, a nicer highschool in the area. Fairly small group of actual friends, but gets along well with everyone.

Michael Porter- Alex's dad, 46. He has worked hard to earn his way up the corperate latter at a national bank, and pulls in a nice income. Looks much like Alex, only an inch or two shorter.

Jessica Porter- Alex's mom, 44. Brown hair, brown eyes, and a good figure for her age. She is a devoted housewife, but helps a friend run a small business from time to time.

Ashley Porter- Alex's older sister, 20. Got most of her mother's genes, and is very beautiful. She has always been the brains of the family, and is in the process of earning a law degree. She works as an intern for a law office in the area, and stays in a nearby apartment, but will crash at the house when she is too tired to go home.

Michelle Porter- Alex's younger sister, 14. The perfect blend of her parents, she is a dirty blonde with an athletic yet feminine body. Most guys have wanted to date her but she hasn't found anyone she is interested in yet. She is just starting highschool, but is prepared for it. She has always looked up to Alex, and the two get along very well, in part due to how close their ages are.

Trent Shepherd- Alex's best friend since moving into the neighborhood eight years ago, age 16. Brown hair, brown eyes, and plays soccer for Wyncroft. They could be brothers in another lifetime, and have almost the same interests.

Charlotte Day- Alex and Trent's friend for the past couple years, 16. She is pretty, but doesnt have all the guys going after her. She plays on the vollyball team, and is a great student. The reason not many guys go after her is because she is always eclipsed by Kayley Miles, the team captain and the hottest girl in the school (but also the biggest bitch). She is funny, but when with Alex and Trent, the three crack jokes nonstop.

Jenn Tucker- Alex's crush. She is also on the volleyball team, but the two hardly ever see each other except when he goes to a game, hangs out with Charlotte before practice, or history class. She is a redhead with a great body and personality, but faces the same problem that Charlotte does.

Well that's the character list. Let's get started, but first some ground rules:
-No guy-on-guy.
-No diapers
-No scat

Powers
-Transforming into anything absorbed
-Can possess people when in liquid virus mode (non-lethal. Well, he can make it lethal.)
-He can create a tether between him and another person, and tap into their nervous system. This gives him control over them like normal, but lets him stay outside their body, and he doesnt have to kill them.
-He can create seperate blobs of him that he controls, which have all of the same powers, and can think independently or take orders from him. Because they are still part of him, he feels what they do, unless he chooses otherwise.

That's it! Have fun, add to the story and enjoy!
